translations.chinese: 可急使守函谷關，毋內諸侯軍，稍徵關中兵以自益，距之。」
translations.english: We can urgently send people to defend Hangu Pass and not let the feudal lords' armies enter, gradually conscript Guanzhong troops to strengthen ourselves, and resist them."
Pei Gong approved this plan and followed it.

translations.chinese: 十二月，項羽果帥諸侯兵欲西入關，關門閉。
translations.english: In the twelfth month, Xiang Yu indeed led the feudal lords' troops wanting to enter the passes to the west, but the pass gates were closed.

translations.chinese: 聞沛公已定關中，羽大怒，使黥 布等攻破函谷關，遂至戲下。
translations.english: He heard that Pei Gong had already pacified Guanzhong. Xiang Yu was greatly angered and sent Ying Bu and others to break through Hangu Pass, then reached Xixia.

translations.chinese: 沛公左司馬曹毋傷聞羽怒，欲攻沛公，使人言羽曰：「沛公欲王關中，令子嬰相，珍寶盡有之。」
translations.english: Pei Gong's left marshal Cao Wushang heard of Xiang Yu's anger and wanted to attack Pei Gong. He sent someone to tell Xiang Yu: "Pei Gong wants to become king of Guanzhong and has Zi Ying as chancellor, possessing all the precious treasures."
